metadata.title: CVE-2017-7480 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: rkhunter versions before 1.4.4 are vulnerable to file download overinsecure channel when doing mirror update resulting into potential remotecode execution.

criterions.comment: rkhunter: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
